title: Mission didn't complete?
body:
I played my first game of the day with my order icon, and won, next mission came up and said kill 400 minions in 1 game as a team while the order icon is equipped. Waited about 10 minutes to play another game and won, team had 430 cs but my mission didn't complete still says 0/1.
The mission was open and in my mission list before I went into game but after game it did NOT complete..  (this was twisted treeline btw; SR WutFace)


Rito pls

replies.body:
https://i.gyazo.com/cabb27285a4bc8a76a334fcdd99071b6.png

This link shows that I've won 2 games today and the first picture shows the first mission complete.. That means the second game was the only game I could have played after the new mission, therefore should have completed the mission. Is this a bug\can't do on TT??

Thanks for the report on this.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a closer look and see what happened.  Should anything wonky have happened, we should be able to assist with that as well.  See you there!
I haven't had a problem doing missions on other game modes up until this point.. I've completed missions on blood moon and twisted treeline so far.  I don't see why that would be a problem.
try doing the mission on summoners rift?
